item.title: 贝莱德在环境、社会和管治（ESG）方面做出让步，逃出得克萨斯州石油抵制黑名单
item.description: 贝莱德公司从得克萨斯州抵制化石燃料的公司黑名单中除名，结束了因全球最大资产管理公司的环境政策而持续三年的对峙。【原文：BlackRock Inc. was removed from Texas’ blacklist of companies that boycott fossil fuels, ending a three-year standoff over the environmental policies of the world’s largest asset manager.】

item.title: 秘鲁称存在大规模非正规铜矿开采活动并有可能发展壮大
item.description: 秘鲁政府首次承认存在大规模的非正规铜矿开采活动，并警告说，高昂的铜价可能会使这种活动在不久的将来愈演愈烈。【原文：Peru’s government is acknowledging for the first time the existence of large-scale informal mining of copper, warning that high prices could see the activity grow in the near future.】

item.title: 银河公司登陆纳斯达克为加美上市扫清障碍
item.description: 银河数码公司（Galaxy Digital Inc.对于在多伦多证券交易所上市的加拿大公司来说，这可能是扭转多年来国内公司选择就近交易的趋势的开始。【原文：Galaxy Digital Inc.’s US debut is a homecoming for the Toronto Stock Exchange-listed, New York-based company. For Canadian firms on the TSX, it could be the start of reversing a multi-year trend of domestic firms choosing to trade closer to where they’re based.】

item.title: S.非洲央行认为有 "绝佳 "机会降低消费物价指数目标
item.description: 南非目前的低通胀水平是一个不可错失的机会，可以借此降低该国的通胀目标，锁定物价压力趋缓和借贷成本降低所带来的好处。【原文：South Africa’s current low level of inflation is an unmissable chance to reduce the country’s inflation target and lock in the benefits of tame price pressures and cheaper borrowing costs.】

item.title: 得克萨斯证券交易所坚持 2026 年首次亮相
item.description: 德克萨斯州证券交易所的顾问、前美国国会议员杰布-亨萨林（Jeb Hensarling）表示，德克萨斯州证券交易所将于明年初作为交易场所首次亮相，因为其强大的竞争对手正在加紧进军该州。【原文：The Texas Stock Exchange is on track to make its debut as a trading venue early next year as its powerful rivals intensify their push into the state, said Jeb Hensarling, an adviser to the proposed marketplace and former US congressman.】

item.title: 特朗普将签署命令将钢铁和铝关税提高至 50
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）宣布，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周二签署一项指令，正式将钢铝关税从 25% 提高到 50%。【原文：President Donald Trump will sign a directive on Tuesday formally raising steel and aluminum tariffs to 50% from 25%, White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt announced.】

item.title: 苏格兰国家银行茨丘丁称月度通胀数据只是一个数据点
item.description: 一位高级官员表示，瑞士国家银行不会被每月的通胀数据所困扰。【原文：The Swiss National Bank won’t be distracted by monthly inflation numbers, according to a senior official.】

item.title: 阿波罗的约翰-齐托认为人工智能热潮将推动私人信贷增长
item.description: 人工智能突飞猛进，即使预测下个月会发生什么也是一项挑战。阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Rapid-fire advancements in artificial intelligence make even predicting what next month will look like a challenge. That uncertainty is an opening for private credit, which has the adaptability needed to fund the fast-growing industry, according to John Zito at Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 前特斯拉高管与星际之门的克鲁索签署意向书
item.description: 由特斯拉公司前高管德鲁-巴格里诺（Drew Baglino）创办的一家初创公司已经签署了销售技术的意向书，该技术旨在解决人工智能热潮的最大瓶颈之一：基础设施老化和变压器短缺。【原文：A startup founded by former Tesla Inc. executive Drew Baglino has signed letters of intent to sell technology designed to address one of the artificial intelligence boom’s biggest bottlenecks: aging infrastructure and a transformer shortage.】

item.title: 美国在关税截止日期前致函贸易伙伴
item.description: 据白宫称，美国贸易代表办公室已致函贸易伙伴，提醒他们关税谈判的最后期限即将到来，这是特朗普政府为推进谈判所做的努力。【原文：The Office of the US Trade Representative has sent letters to trading partners to remind them of an upcoming deadline in tariff negotiations, according to the White House, an effort by the Trump administration to push forward talks.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格的人工智能泔水会让广告变得更可怕、更糟糕
item.description:
随着 Meta 对公司如何与客户对话的控制权不断增加，我们其他人可能会被淹没在更多算法的平庸之中。【原文：

As Meta grabs for more control over how companies talk to customers, the rest of us may be left flooded in more algorithmic mediocrity.

】

item.title: 液化天然气开发商 Delfin 为美国项目寻找投资者
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，Delfin Midstream 公司正在寻求投资，以资助一项通过停泊在路易斯安那州沿海的基础设施出口液化天然气的计划。【原文：Delfin Midstream is seeking investment to help fund a plan to export liquefied natural gas via infrastructure moored off the coast of Louisiana, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 马拉松公司的理查兹对向软件公司直接贷款持谨慎态度
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司首席执行官兼创始人布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）说，向软件技术公司发放私人贷款并不 "明智"。【原文：Handing out private loans to software technology companies is not “intelligent,” said Marathon Asset Management Chief Executive Officer and founder Bruce Richards.】

item.title: 美联储库克强调价格稳定对经济的重要性
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，她认为关税有可能刺激通胀和削弱就业，但同时强调了在考虑未来利率调整时物价稳定的重要性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said she sees tariffs as potentially stoking inflation and weakening employment, yet underscored the importance of price stability when considering future interest-rate adjustments.】

item.title: 巴拉圭就天然气管道计划向阿根廷和巴西提出建议
item.description: 据南美内陆国家巴拉圭的一位高级官员称，巴拉圭正在游说阿根廷和巴西签署协议，表明它们对连接三国的天然气管道提案的政治支持。【原文：Paraguay is lobbying Argentina and Brazil to sign agreements signaling their political support for a proposed natural gas pipeline linking the three countries, according to a senior official in the landlocked South American nation.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称 Meta 的核电交易可能比微软便宜
item.description: 对运行人工智能所需的电力需求激增，促使 Meta Platforms 公司与美国最大的核电运营商签订了一份为期 20 年的合同，该协议的价格可能比竞争对手微软公司去年签订的类似协议更便宜。【原文：Surging demand for power to run artificial intelligence just prompted Meta Platforms Inc. to enter a 20-year contract with the biggest US nuclear operator, penning a deal that’s likely to be priced at a cheaper rate than a similar agreement rival Microsoft Corp. entered last year.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称 Meta 的核电交易可能比微软便宜
item.description: 对运行人工智能所需的电力需求激增，促使 Meta Platforms 公司与美国最大的核电运营商签订了一份为期 20 年的合同，该协议的价格可能比竞争对手微软公司去年签订的类似协议更便宜。【原文：Surging demand for power to run artificial intelligence just prompted Meta Platforms Inc. to enter a 20-year contract with the biggest US nuclear operator, penning a deal that’s likely to be priced at a cheaper rate than a similar agreement rival Microsoft Corp. entered last year.】

item.title: 哈根达斯制造商 Froneri 将举债 40 亿欧元，PAI 谋求保留股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，冰淇淋生产商 Froneri Ltd. 正在寻求约 40 亿欧元（46 亿美元）的债务，以支持一项基金，让共同所有者 PAI Partners 持有其在雀巢公司支持的合资企业中的股份，并促进股息支付。【原文：Ice cream maker Froneri Ltd. is seeking around €4 billion ($4.6 billion) in debt to support a fund that would let co-owner PAI Partners hold onto its stake in the Nestle SA-backed joint venture and facilitate a dividend payment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: AQR 的克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）盛赞 "基本理性投资 "的回归
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）的克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）表示，多年的投机性过剩正在让位于更健康的市场，基本面现在变得很重要，从而全面推动了量化选股策略的发展。【原文：Years of speculative excess are giving way to healthier markets where fundamentals now matter, boosting quant stock-picking strategies across the board, according to AQR Capital Management’s Cliff Asness.】

item.title: 降雨减缓部分火势蔓延，阿尔伯塔省火灾威胁趋于稳定
item.description: 由于降雨减缓了一些大火的蔓延，阿尔伯塔省的野火威胁趋于稳定，这些大火迫使人们撤离，并关闭了加拿大约 7% 的石油日产量。【原文：Alberta’s wildfire threat stabilized as rain slowed the growth of some blazes that have forced evacuations and shut about 7% of Canada’s daily oil production.】

item.title: 南非汽油价格降幅被燃油附加费涨幅抵消
item.description: 南非四年来首次上调燃油税，抵消了汽油和柴油价格的下降，因为法院驳回了要求停止上调燃油税的紧急申请。【原文：South Africa’s first fuel-levy hike in four years offset a drop in gasoline and diesel prices after a court dismissed an urgent application to stop the increase.】

item.title: 纽约联储称 2025 年大部分时间净收入可能为负值
item.description: 根据纽约联储的最新预测，美联储系统公开市场账户的总净收入在 2025 年可能会保持负值，最早也要到明年才能恢复到正值水平。【原文：Total net income from the Federal Reserve’s System Open Market Account could remain negative in 2025 before returning to positive levels as early as next year, according to new projections from the New York Fed.】

item.title: 分析师称卡尼推迟预算加剧加拿大经济不确定性
item.description: 在彭博社的一项调查中，大多数经济学家表示，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）将加拿大预算推迟到今年晚些时候的决定增加了经济的不确定性，但不太可能引发投资者的担忧。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney’s decision to delay Canada’s budget until later this year increases economic uncertainty but isn’t likely to spark worries among investors, say a majority of economists in a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 科威特财富基金加入微软支持的 300 亿美元人工智能企业
item.description: 科威特的主权财富基金正在加入微软公司支持的一项计划，为全球人工智能基础设施提供 300 亿美元的资金支持，这个石油资源丰富的海湾国家正寻求进入这个蓬勃发展的行业。【原文：Kuwait’s sovereign wealth fund is joining a Microsoft Corp.-backed initiative to bankroll $30 billion in artificial intelligence infrastructure globally, as the oil-rich Gulf nation looks to tap into the booming sector.】

item.title: 法国参议院修正快时尚法案，将矛头指向 Shein 和 Temu
item.description: 法国参议员们正试图加强旨在监管快速时尚的立法计划，将矛头指向中国创立的申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）和特姆（Temu）等超廉价服装销售商。【原文：French senators are seeking to sharpen planned legislation aimed at regulating fast fashion to target sellers of ultra-cheap clothing such as Chinese-founded Shein Group Ltd. and Temu.】

item.title: 加拿大大火阻碍重要油流，美国主要油价指数走强
item.description: 由于加拿大的野火威胁到美国重要的储存中心，限制了欧佩克+增加供应的影响，衡量美国石油市场强度的主要指标正在飙升。【原文：Key gauges of US oil market strength are soaring as wildfires in Canada risk flows to critical American storage hubs, limiting the impact of OPEC+ supply increases.】

item.title: 法国称与中国的干邑调查会谈可能取得积极成果
item.description: 法国贸易部长表示，他相信北京和巴黎能够解决因干邑白兰地关税引发的争执。【原文：France’s trade minister said he believes Beijing and Paris can resolve a spat over duties on Cognac that is hammering French producers and complicating broader discussions on global commerce.】

item.title: 棕榈滩住房紧张引发 2.36 亿美元的宿舍公用事业交易
item.description: 棕榈滩大西洋大学（Palm Beach Atlantic University）的学生宿舍非常紧张，以至于一些申请者选择放弃入学。2.358 亿美元的高收益债券交易是学校扭转这一趋势的赌注。【原文：Student housing is so tight at Palm Beach Atlantic University that some applicants have chosen not to enroll. A $235.8 million high-yield bond deal is the school’s bet to reverse that trend.】

item.title: KKR 建立创纪录的 420 亿美元私人房地产贷款管道
item.description: KKR & Co.的商业地产融资数量创下了历史新高，随着房地产价格的重启以及其他贷款机构在市场波动中的回撤，预计将会有更多的交易。【原文：KKR & Co. has a record volume of commercial-property financings lined up, and expects more deals as property prices reset and other lenders pull back amid market volatility.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔誓言重返债务市场，令债券飙升
item.description: 周二，在厄瓜多尔最高财政官员表示政府计划明年重返资本市场后，厄瓜多尔债券在新兴市场中涨幅最大。【原文：Ecuador bonds jumped the most in emerging markets on Tuesday after the nation’s top finance officer said the government plans to return to capital markets next year.】
